text:
DEARBORN PUBLIC SCHOOLS
4324 LOIS, DEARBORN, MICHIGAN 4B126
532-0441
School Relations
MARION CORWELL, Associate Director
July 28, 1964
Mr. Lou Peneguy, Director
Coordination & Information
Alabama Educational Television Commission
2151 Highland Ave.
Birmingham, Alabama
Dear Lou:
Now that you are an official member of the MED Public
Relations Committee, I would like to give you your first
assignment*
During the coming.year we would like to prepare a Speakers 1
Guide listing individuals throughout the United States who are
prepared to speak on educational broadcasting. As you know, there
is a great demand for speakers for HTAâ€™s and various civic organisation.
would you please look at the enclosed guides of ideas, then
compile one which might be appropriate for the NAEB?
Include names of speakers from tho various regions. We
will send your suggestions to other committee members and ask
them to add additional names and within the next several months
I hope we can have a guide which could be published for our TTAEB
members.
All the best,
Marion Corwell
Associate Director
Enclosure
cc: Haro!
